rukus.text: L.R. (Alif. Lam. Ra.) These are verses of the clear (and clarifying) book
We sent it down, an Arabic Quran, so that you may understand
We tell you the best stories in what We revealed to you in this Quran while you were of the negligent ones before it
(Remember) when Joseph said to his father: my father, indeed I saw (in my dream) eleven stars and the sun and the moon, I saw them being humble before me
He said: my son, do not tell your dream to your brothers, so they don't plan a plot against you, indeed Satan is human being’s obvious enemy

And that is how your Master chooses you and teaches you the interpretation of events (and dreams) and completes His favor on you and the Jacob’s family as He previously completed it on your fathers Abraham and Isaac. Indeed your Master is knowledgeable and wise
